snippet: Damien Hirst has answered a long-running question in the art world: How many of his spot paintings are there, anyway?
abstract: Artist Damien Hirst reveals in his upcoming book that there are 1,365 of his long-celebrated spot paintings; actual number of Hirst's spot paintings, which first appeared in the mid-1980s, has been a mystery, until now.
lead_paragraph: Damien Hirst has answered a long-running question in the art world: How many of his spot paintings are there, anyway?

headline.seo: Damien Hirst’s Spot Paintings: The Field Guide
headline.main: Hirst Counts the Dots, or at Least the Paintings
headline.print_headline: Hirst Counts the Dots, or at Least the Paintings
